name: Evil Lord Rabbit
description:
Submission to Fireside Jam 2022. 

Theme - Protect

Protect your lady from Evil Lord Rabbit. Press the left mouse button or touch screen in right moment to swing a sword towards Evil Lord Rabbit. You have to repel 10 attacks to drive away Evil Lord Rabbit and live with your lady happily ever after.

Graphic: Nicepng , Pngegg

Music: Remaxim
